lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: We are responsible for the world in which we find ourselves, if only because we are the only sentient force which can change it - James Baldwin

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: We are a women owned international small business and want to see other women experience success !!!!!!!!!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make my small difference in the world, and I believe that the best way to have a positive impact on developing economies is from the bottom up.
lender.occupational_info: I publish a daily newsletter about computers and new technology.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I help make books.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to see the direct effect of my loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the operations of an investment company that invests in private businesses around the world.

lender.name: Myron & Shirley
lender.loan_because: It's time to help others by circulating our gifts.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help out those who need a leg up!
lender.occupational_info: I am an exclusive home buyer's agent, a consumer advocate helping people through the home purchase process.

lender.name: Cristian Vicente
lender.loan_because: EMPRESA DEDICADA A SERVIR A NEGOCIOS PEQUEÑOS PARA QUE PUEDAN SERVIR A LA COMUNICAD
lender.occupational_info: EMPRESA DEDICADA A SERVIR A NEGOCIOS PEQUEÑOS PARA QUE PUEDAN SERVIR A LA COMUNICAD

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of promoting ingenuity around the world and the way this site connects you to the individual.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in an office helping staff with their computer problems.

lender.name: Astra
lender.loan_because: i like to give to people who need money.
lender.occupational_info: I go to college and i learn about all sorts of things, like how to read better and how use the computer and how to do math better.

lender.name: Sumalee for Greyson
lender.loan_because: I loan on behalf of my godchild Greyson, who is 4 years old. As he grows up, I look forward to sharing our history of helping others around the world.

lender.name: Bonita
lender.loan_because: "We can not do great things, just small things with great love" Mother Theresa
lender.occupational_info: I hang out with teenagers, helping them discover their creative spirit.

lender.name: Debleena
lender.loan_because: I like to see people succeed.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to make a huge change in somebody's life who will really appreciate it! A little effort and little money can go a long way for these people.
lender.occupational_info: I type letters, answer phones and help attorneys with their work advocating for others. I also play roller derby, which is a sport where you roller skate and race others, but like football- American style!

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: I know how important it is to be self sufficient and be able to support your family.
lender.occupational_info: My work is typically office support staff.

lender.name: Ocean Digital
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gerry & Ginny
lender.loan_because: We wanted to bless others because God has blessed us!
lender.occupational_info: Ginny is a School Teacher. Gerry is a Pastor.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to resolve any problem they have. We resolve these problems through prayer.

lender.name: Brad Greiner
lender.loan_because: Everyone in this world should be given the chance to succeed. I think Kiva is a great platform to make this a possibility.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Toshiko
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way. And I wanna help someone who has good dreams.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: Nothing is predestined: The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings. --Ralph Blum Kiva is a "gateway" for us to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects to clean up environmental damage cause by human activity. I hope to leave the earth a cleaner place than I found it. I also hope that organizations like Kiva continue to prosper and share the message that we should all try to help our neighbors around the world to make the world a better place for future generations.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Paraguay, and I know the benefits first hand of lending to small entrepreneurs, to better the lives of their families and communities. In particular, women borrowers have a great impact on both, and have an excellent track record of paying off their debt. I believe that some of the most effective development is that carried out by small entrepreneurs, rather than large aid organizations like the World Bank and USAID.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a high school and provide personal, academic and career counseling to adolescents. I also work closely with their parents, teachers and administrators, to help our students be successful and ready for education/training beyond high school.

lender.name: beth
lender.loan_because: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
lender.occupational_info: I create clothing, bags and home decor from recycled and vintage fabric and trim in my little house

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We make chopper bicycles in my country, the philippines. Its still non-existent here so i want to start the craze.
lender.occupational_info: I basically have to market everything, including what a chopper is, is it ridable, safe, and not just decoration. I'm Mr. Chopper here!

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I used to live in Cambodia and saw how difficult it was for people to raise funds to start a business.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: People who want to help themselves, help this world become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer networks for a small brewery in the midwest US.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: Being a business owner myself, it gives me confidence when I have the support of others. Also, what a great way to reach out and make the world a better place!

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: Even though I am only 15 months old, I believe that it important to be grateful for what we have been given and to help those around us that may be in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am just a baby who wants to grow up to make a difference in this world.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Even though I am only 3 years old, I want to make sure I do my part to make this world a better place. By lending money to those in need, I can do my part.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 3 year old kid who just wants to help others.

lender.name: Gustavo
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs grow their businesses, create jobs, and have a better life with their families.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: ........why not?

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: of the principles behind giving and receiving.
lender.occupational_info: Banking

lender.name: Bry
lender.loan_because: There are others in the world that are less fortunate than I am. These individuals deserve the chance at a better life for themselves and their families. I'm glad I can help them.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday I wake up and get ready for a new day at my high school. I am involved in student government, athletics and the school band and also in my community.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to show you care and to make a tangible difference in someone's life. You're giving someone a "hand up" not a "hand out".
lender.occupational_info: I help write software for a large company. Being a mother is a pretty universal "job" - the most important one I'll ever have!

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to help in at least some way, even if small.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and direct programs providing mental health care to those in need.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I think there are great businesses to support all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in graduate school to study how social structures influence health outcomes.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Small actions make big changes.
lender.occupational_info: I press buttons in the right order.

lender.name: 4 Walls
lender.loan_because: to support fellow entrepreneurs in need and to honor my customers.
lender.occupational_info: We run an Internet company, www.4Walls.us, that helps people in the US find apartments. Our customers include Lindy Property, and we are making our donation in their honor.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: my initial investment of $100 has been repaid and reinvested several times, helping many more people than i thought possible!
lender.occupational_info: i, too, am a small business owner who was given an opportunity to support myself with self-employment, and i'm grateful to be able to help other entrepreneurs around the world who are trying to do the same.

lender.name: EKP
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 8th grader and love school.

lender.name: Tobin
lender.loan_because: it is fun.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I've seen for myself the power that small loans have to change the lives of African women. I think that Kiva enables that power to spread around the world.
lender.occupational_info: master's student at the University of Chicago studying religion and women's health

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: this is an amazing way to give people a hand up- out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events that raise money for charity.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I have the richest inheritance thinkable awaiting me as child of God, redeemed by Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: we all have a responsibility to care for our fellow humankind. Hope brings peace.

lender.name: Leslie Stecher
lender.loan_because: What she said! My sister.
lender.occupational_info: I order products for an auto & ag parts store.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who work to improve the lives of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I design airplanes.

lender.name: Steve & Candi
lender.loan_because: I've lived among the impoverished people of Brazil, and I want to help people who have the desire and work ethic to support their families. We can help...so we should!
lender.occupational_info: I make plans for the smart growth of cities, and Candi raises our beautiful children.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Although the first part of my life was a financial struggle, I now find myself in the fortunate position of being able to help others. This is something I have always wanted to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor and a part-time adult education teacher in the field of management.

lender.name: Sassy Pants
lender.loan_because: It makes my tail wag and my whiskers twitch.
lender.occupational_info: Laying on the couch, eating kibble, running in the yard, and playing with my animal friends, Jack , Zoe and Rossi.

lender.name: Takuya Inoue
lender.loan_because:
Simply I like helping people.
No one on the earth can live without supporting each other.
The concept of KIVA really fascinated me when I was reading an article about KIVA on a newspaper. I have to thank the Kiva founder from the bottom of my heart for providing us with the opportunity to help people on the opposite side of the world effectively.
'' A life lived for others is worth living''
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Economics at Brigham Young University- Idaho.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I want to help making the world a better place through practical initiatives, contributing at my individual scale with a small amount which will combine with many more to create a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand math, and pass their math exams so they can make progress in their career.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I like to share what I can to make other peoples lives easier!
lender.occupational_info: I sell vintage clothing and make art from my little home in the woods:)

lender.name: Mitsuru
lender.loan_because: to find out what I am

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: My friend Alex heard about Kiva on Oprah. And I was fortunate enough to see the power of microloans in action in Vietnam.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: '...there, but for the grace of God, go I...'

lender.name: janbelle
lender.loan_because: i want to expand and sell more food prouducts .please help us
lender.occupational_info: we wake very early in the morning to make breakfast for those going to work and closed the store after wards because we are short in money to continue cook the whole day

lender.name: Maria Cristina
lender.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves!

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: By making micro-loans to female entreprenuers in developing areas, the LEAP Foundation hopes to join many other charity based organizations that grant micro-loans to deserving borrowers worldwide. By helping them grow and expand their own endeavors, LEAP can empower women to take control of their own futures by enabling them to continually focus on the growth necesasary to sustain long term productivity. We hope to become a key element to helping these women create and sustain wealth for themselves, their families, and their communities by helping them with capital to which they otherwise would have no access.

lender.name: gilbert
lender.loan_because: to have a small general merchandise store and to help my family in our financial and daily needs and i want also to go back to school to finish my college level as a hotel and restaurant management course and to give my family a better future,by building our future dream house and have a happy family
lender.occupational_info: i am a sales demo in a department store assigned in shoes department i sell to customer a ladies shoes where i am working now.

lender.name: Ai Lin
lender.loan_because: I would like to help everyone, especially fellow Asians, get a chance to improve their lives and retain their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people just before they enter university.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: This program appears to be a win win situation for everyone involved. If my small donations can make a difference in someone's life than I am happy about that. And the fact that the donations are repaid is really a unique set-up.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and a devoted grandmother to 6 children (soon to be seven) ranging in age from 13 1/2 to 2 1/2 years. They are the light of my life. I have been happily married for 40 years and my family is the most important thing in my life. This love of family comes through in the stories of the people receiving the loans and it is a wonderful thing to be able to help in this small way.

lender.name: Susana
lender.loan_because: helping encourage the economy in developing countries to flourish enables them to ultimately be self sufficient
lender.occupational_info: I fly internationally for a major U.S. air carrier

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help those in need. Sure, giving money is a generous gesture, but providing the tools for independence is the gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I live in a rich country and enjoy more freedom than most women on the planet. I want to make the world a better place by contributing any way I can.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I really admire and respect these people who keep fighting for a better life for themselves when their odds are not great. I hope to learn something from them.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I have often thought it would be difficult for me to make to make a difference in someone's life. Kiva has given me this opportunity, and I hope this will be the start of a long partnership, between myself, Kiva, and someone who wants to improve thier life. Kiva, thank you for the bridge.

lender.name: Benjamin Shobert
lender.loan_because: The world changes when individuals connect with an idea bigger than themselves, and the opportunity to blend the good of globalization by lending to those who are too easily overlooked or overwhelmed by the very same processes is one such "big" idea.
lender.occupational_info: I own & manage two businesses: one a consulting business helping Chinese businesses come to America (and vice versa) and another that sells an over the counter (OTC) medical good.

lender.name: R.D.
lender.loan_because: Others will be given an opportunity that many Americans take for granted!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: "I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world." ~Socrates

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I think it is wonderful to stretch out a helping hand across the miles. I live in a land of plenty, others are far less fortunate. Kiva is a fantastic concept.

lender.name: David with friends
lender.loan_because: I want to help and I like this concept.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It seems an easy way to reach out to people I'll never meet.
lender.occupational_info: Working to give people knowledge and helping others bring their wisdom to decisions.

lender.name: Makeva
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a profound difference in the life of someone who truly needs a blessing! Independence is such a great gift!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world extensively, and believe in the inspirational power of education+investment as a means to help people help themselves. I was further inspired by Muhammad Yunus winning the Nobel Prize for micro-lending at his Grameen Bank. Kiva enables me to invest in this same global "cycle of opportunity" on a personal basis.
lender.occupational_info: High Tech Marketing.

lender.name: Achim
lender.loan_because: let other have part of my good luck in my life.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I'd like to know that I can actually make some kind of connection with people in different parts of the world. I'd like to help folks make things happen that create positive change.
lender.occupational_info: I teach doctors how to use computers to help their patients

lender.name: suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help ease the burden of hard working mothers who just want to see their families grow up healthy and happy.
lender.occupational_info: It's very rewarding to make people happy by serving them a wonderful meals and making. their evening a memorable one.

lender.name: Seamus, Jake & Maddie
lender.loan_because: we want to see the world. And transform it for the better - any way we can, one baby step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: We don't work yet, but we are working every day to learn, grow, contribute and, our mom and dad hope, to love this amazing world we live in.

lender.name: Stanley
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.occupation: Program Specialist at International Education org.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate for what I have accomplished in life as a single mother, and I want to help others accomplish their goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: I assist scientists at my academic institution to get grants for cutting edge work in medicine that may someday change the face of world medicine.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I plan events and bring locals together to support the arts.

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: My life is blessed and it's time to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are mentally ill and need someone to help them recover their lives.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I love to see people suceed in their lives and be an example for their children to follow.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a school

lender.name: Caleb & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because:
We are both very excited to help other people achieve the dream of financial success through owning your own business. We are working towards this financial goal ourselves - currently we both have jobs where we work 40 hours per week and in addition, we have our own business outside of that - we have bought several apartments that we rent to students and young adults. We are excited to hear about both the struggles and the successes from other people around the world who also own their own businesses.
We also love to be connected to people from outside our country - we travel a lot and have also lived abroad for a couple months. Thank you so much for the opportunity to get to know you and your business!
lender.occupational_info:
During the daytime Monday-Friday we are both mechanical engineers. Caleb helps design the manufacturing equipment that creates incredibly sharp razor blades for the Gillette Company.
Elizabeth works in a "consultancy" business designing products. The way this business works is that different companies big and small looking for new ideas ask her to design new and innovative products for them. Elizabeth has designed a medical injector for a drug called insulin which is used in treating diabetes. She has also designed a tool for use in the kitchen, and a door knob that is very easy for older people to use.
After work, Caleb and Elizabeth manage and maintain their properties that they rent to 10 people.

lender.name: John & Mitzi
lender.loan_because: I like being able to see who will benefit from the loan and what will become of the money.
lender.occupational_info:
I earn money from selling computers and telephone headsets to businesses in the UK and when I'm not doing that I'm usually playing a guitar.
Mitzi would rather be playing.

lender.name: Tracy Hansel
lender.occupational_info: Tax Attorney

lender.name: Katherine
lender.occupation: advocate for women with postpartum depression
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to help make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for in my own life. The least I can do is help others who haven't had the same kind of opportunities I have had. But I know that just giving money away isn't necessarily going to make a long term difference for people. Helping them get a fresh start on an enterprise that they will invest their own vision and effort in can make a real difference. And if I make loans, I get to help people this way over and over again!

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: I like to support entrepreneurs everywhere.

lender.name: Catie
lender.loan_because: it takes so little to do so much

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: we all have the means to do good

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Becasue I can, it seems like it could do some good, and it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I work for IBM contracted to support computers and network for Schneider Electric. The factories I support produce electrical boxes and transformers.

lender.name: Gloria Dei
lender.loan_because: 1 John 3:16-18 "We know love by this, that he laid down his life for us - and we ought to lay down our lives for one another. How does God’s love abide in anyone who has the world’s goods and sees a brother or sister in need and yet refuses help? Little children, let us love, not in word or speech, but in truth and action." (NRSV)
lender.occupational_info: We are Christian teenagers. We wanted to help others through kiva loans, so we held a Christmas carnival for the younger children in our church. We played games, painted faces, watched movies, and did craft projects. The money we raised is being used to make these loans. See our congregation's website at http://www.gloriadeinorthbrook.org. The link below contains a world map of our loans.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I work a lot, so in terms of sharing with others, I have more money than time.
lender.occupational_info: I work with academic libraries to improve their operations.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: 1) Prosperity is a precursor to peace. 2) Entreprenuership is the backbone of prosperity. 3) It takes money to make money. 4) And everyone should have the opportunity to live the "American Dream", even if its in another part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate stocks for investment funds.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: I create and edit policy and procedure manuals and documents.

lender.name: Jenny and Scott
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly that people helping people from across the globe can help unite the world in peace. As long as I am able, I feel it my responsibility to be a part of that peace.
lender.occupational_info: I teach orchestra (violin, viola, cello and bass) to children ages 9-18 in public school. They choose to take my class because they want to learn how to play those instruments and enjoy making music together. It is a great job!

lender.name: Cher-Ron
lender.occupation: Single Hardworking mother who is an Idea generator

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe that 'sharing the wealth' and capitalism aren't mutually exclusive concepts. (Go Obama!)
lender.occupational_info: A healthy democracy requires an informed citizenry -- through my work I help people understand the world around them and make smarter decisions.

lender.name: Tecumseh grade 4/5
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have excess money that other people need more than we do. We are from one of the richest countries in the world and we feel that we have more money than we really need. Our teacher does not want gifts at holidays so we donate to Kiva instead.
lender.occupational_info: We are learning to be citizens of the world.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small non-profit organization who has been bringing classical musicians to perform concerts in this rural area for 27 years...music is good for the soul and makes people happy. We also provide music programs in local classrooms...we want our children to be happy too!

lender.name: Xing
lender.loan_because: This seems like a worthwhile cause. It feels good to do so little and potentially change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the video game industry.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I admire their determination and spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Women's Business Enterprise Council South, an organization for women business owners interested in promoting, developing and maintaining business relationships with other women business owners, major corporations and governmental agencies.

lender.name: Lori , Don, Diane & Bud
lender.loan_because: We are very Fortunate to live where we live ,and have the opportunity to help those who need the help.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help somone work towards building a better future for themselves. I feel blessed to be where I am today and feel fortunate to be able to help others.

lender.name: Mina
lender.loan_because: It is admirable for those less fortunate then I to work and make a living. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the software industry managing teams. I like to think that I am able to help my team perform their best work.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Marketing for a news syndication comp

lender.name: Cookie's Kids
lender.loan_because: I want my children and grandchildren to see what can be done for others to give them opportunity at a better life.
lender.occupational_info: NGO work in Latin America

lender.name: DEBORAH
lender.loan_because: We want to help others get a chance at a better life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: without the generosity of friends and strangers, I would not be in the position to give back to others in need today.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to students from around the world who want to study in the United States and realize their dreams.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am able to.
lender.occupational_info: I live free or die.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: Because we all need a helping hand every once and a while.
lender.occupational_info: I help College students find jobs within the company I work for and help get them set-up on their path in life.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the industry of those seeking the loans.
lender.occupational_info: I try to learn things to improve the health of people.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I wish to enrich the lives of others and provide hope to families that have a desire to improve their lives through work and dedication.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I've travelled to remote areas of Asia and see both the fine qualities of mountain people everywhere, as well as the need for financial aid with a personal touch.
lender.occupational_info: I grow vegetables for my community, and teach people how to look after our wild areas and mountains.

lender.name: sasha
lender.loan_because: Like everyone else I feel the need to share.. :) Thanks KIVA for creating this great tool to reach out and be of assistance to someone even across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Educating people with special needs

lender.name: Fred Krazeise
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: Commerical Banking

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: It is something I can do.

lender.name: Ahmed
lender.loan_because: everyone's dream is worth pursuing

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: to help on a human scale, 1 at a time
lender.occupational_info: I seek to create the beauty I see in the world in my art, and to encourage others creative expression as an art psychotherapist.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help others grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Sales

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: I am very interested in the developing world. Helping others that want help is a plus.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and managing projects.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: The right to work and provide for family, friend and self is universal.
lender.occupational_info: I help actors find jobs.

lender.name: Max and Danja
lender.loan_because: We love to see people succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: We create things for the web.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for a sawmill. My job is to ensure the customers lumber orders are shipped on time via rail or truck.

lender.name: St. Louis, MO; USA
lender.occupational_info: Photography is my passion. I started my own wedding photography business a few years ago and have been so blessed to be able to live my dream. My family has been so supportive. I work full-time managing the creation of teaching software, but someday I hope to be able to just do photography full time and have more time with my family. They are my world.

lender.name: Lois,Jon,Kyle&Erika
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower other people to live their best lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hair stylist and own my own business. I work with 8 other people to help people feel better about who they are every day.

lender.name: Ray and Ja
lender.loan_because: it's one way we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Ray is a life-long learner and Ja is a teacher. Go figure. We teach, pray and play...hard...every day.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I go to school on weekdays to learn about many different things as well as prepare me for life after school win the working world

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Graciete
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a hands on and direct way of helping a fellow human being help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the international department of a bank. I transfer money across the world for the customers of the bank.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I know every bit helps. I do believe that you reap what you sow; therefore, I want to plant seeds in otherwise desolate grounds so others may reap a good harvest.
lender.occupational_info: My work is what I do to make ends meet, but in the end, does not define who I am. I am a giver and my job affords me the opportunity to give to others.

lender.name: CAJ
lender.loan_because: I believe the funds I can lend through KIVA go to those most worthy. As my cup is overflowing so can I share.
lender.occupational_info: I participated with many others in the design and build out of wireless telecommunication systems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in building self reliance and sustainable business practices
lender.occupational_info: We provide internet services to companies focused on being good, responsible corporate citizens.

lender.name: Parrish
lender.loan_because: It's an attempt to create and sustain positive change in allowing people to retain income.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers to empower them to develop skills and critical awareness that translate into statewide and national policies that promote teen health.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: i party

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I lived in Uganda for a little over 3 months and it changed my life. I have a deeper desire and understanding of development work and strongly support micro loans and have seen first hand the life changing affect they can have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Brigham Young University as well as the Co-Founder of a nonprofit organization called Musana Jewelry which helps women in Lugazi, Uganda through jewelry production in Uganda and selling the products in America.

lender.name: CandicesAngels
lender.loan_because: All people matter and are our clients. In our world, we always put our clients first.
lender.occupational_info: We are bank tellers working for the greater good under the watchful eye of our fearless leader, Candice.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in education and empowering others .
lender.occupational_info: Assist young adults obtain work in their chosen profession.

lender.name: Shemaj
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurship!
lender.occupational_info: I am a boring government worker.

lender.name: Sharman
lender.loan_because: I love to travel and meet people from different cultures. For years I've wanted to partner with people in a safe, regulated way. Now I easily reach out to new business people worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: leading classes at my church and other organizations as a volunteer

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: When I first read about Kiva in the newspaper, I thought it was a novel idea, and I love the fact that my donations are actual loans--not handouts--that will encourage responsible entrepreneurs around the world to push themselves to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in various crew positions on independent motion pictures, and also write original movie scripts. I am interested in working on small productions that otherwise could not compete with the large movie studios. I'm all for "the little guy."

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate for all I have and would like to make an impact in someone else's life
lender.occupational_info: Sales/Marketing Engineer

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: Life is Good. Giving is Good.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I'm making a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: One token of kindness goes a long way. We all have more than what we need. In the end, I want to look back and think how did I help others.

lender.name: Big Baba, Baba and Mini
lender.loan_because: I want to help others as I have been helped.
lender.occupational_info: sales

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I loan to support those that dream of making a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: Its a great way of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I,m a self employed painter of mostly residential property

lender.name: Fadeva
lender.loan_because: To keep the peace~ Share it!
lender.occupational_info: Writer, teacher, poet.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: all human beings are created in the image of God and are my brothers and sisters. It's just the natural and right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: I work in a strategic design agency. We help companies and organizations communicate effectively and deliver value to the people who help them grow.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I like to fix things.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship lifts the living standards of entire communities not just those of the entrepreneurs themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Investor

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I love helping other people
lender.occupational_info: I fix up peoples houses

lender.name: Hello
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes the process of helping others so easy. The small donation I make can help someone in a big way. The Kiva loan recipients are people wanting to do something for themselves, to make a difference in their own lives. I've always wanted to start my own business and this is my way of helping someone else with those same goals.

lender.name: Steven and AyJy
lender.loan_because: We want to support microfinance, and it makes sense for us to put aside some savings for a few months at a time.

lender.name: Brick
lender.loan_because: I feel people deserve my support in building a better life for themselves and the people around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician and a writer. I try to spread happiness through the results of my creativity.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My first loan was made by redeeming a gift certificate. With this gift I want to keep giving and to make a difference wherever Ican.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a book publishing company. I work on a team that develops books that help people improve their lives and to reach their potential. I hope this small loan helps improve your life and the lives of those where you live.
